Offline MD5 Calcurator WebPage.

browser is not supported.

Drop files OR
Click to open file select dialog.
clear download file
file namemd5
 

  

  


  

    The server-less web application for calculating MD5 digest
    for the given files.

    It uses:

    
    
      
  •  html5 (FILE API)
      
  •  
        Cyboze Labs' MD5 library to accomplish the job.
    


    [note] Due to the FILE API limitation, it may not work for large files.
  


  

  

    Visit 
      
      source repository.
